title.en: Predicting Lithium-Ion Battery Degradation with Transformer Models
title.zh-Hans: 基于Transformer模型的锂离子电池退化预测

summary.en: Using attention-based sequence models to predict remaining useful life of lithium-ion batteries from early-cycle charging data.
summary.zh-Hans: 利用基于注意力机制的序列模型，从早期循环充电数据预测锂离子电池的剩余使用寿命。

problem_statement.en: Battery degradation is nonlinear and depends on complex electrochemical processes. Accurate early prediction of remaining useful life is critical for EV fleet management and grid storage.
problem_statement.zh-Hans: 电池退化是非线性的，取决于复杂的电化学过程。准确的剩余使用寿命早期预测对电动车队管理和电网储能至关重要。

contributions.en: Temporal attention mechanism for charge-discharge curve encoding; transfer learning from simulation to real-world cycling data.
contributions.zh-Hans: 用于充放电曲线编码的时间注意力机制；从仿真到真实循环数据的迁移学习。
